- New: Gangs! It's time to build your own legacy!
- New city: London! Let's travel the Atlantic to set foot in Europe!
- New Capo: Stefano ""Wheels"" Falcone
- New: Season Pass! Collect additional rewards while finishing your tasks.
- Added Hard Mode in Jailbreak - even stronger enemies await!
- Performance optimizations
- Several bug fixes

- New: Money Talks. Defend your turf with all you got!
- New: Debt Collector. Collect the rewards you're owed!
- New: Daily Login rewards. Free rewards every day!
- New Capo: Chiyo "Shadow" Kunoichi
- New: Traits Safe. Choose to only draw STR, BIZ or TECH capos
- New: choose your personal Avatar
- Improved Capo Exchange: choose a specific Nation or Trait in Capo Exchange
- Improved Nation Safe: increased the chance of drawing a legendary capo
- Gameplay optimizations for: Gang, payment packs and several other features

- Gang: members can be ranked by contribution points
- Weekend Event: added display to show income per second
- Capo Exchange: optimized 'fodder' capo selection process
- Bounty List: lowered the difficulty of some tasks in early game (up to Rank 12)
- Performance optimizations and other smaller bug fixes

- New: PvP! It's time to find out who the true Godfather is.
- New: Gang Kingpin Leaderboard. How does your Gang square off against others?
- New: First Purchase Gift. Those who support the Familia will get rewarded.
- New: collect Cash automatically. One button to collect them all!
- Gameplay optimizations for: Capo upgrades and Capo Exchange
- Several bug fixes

- New: Military Base. A brand new weekend event!
- New: Team Fight! Challenge the Nemesis with your whole Gang.
- New: Friends List. Exchange gifts every day with your friends.
- New: Paris is expanding! New streets have been added.
- Capo Exchange optimization: reduced points required for Legendary Capo Exchange.
- Tip: players whose game account is connected to a third party app (e.g. Facebook), might be logged out and need to log in again.
- Several bug fixes.
